pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simulation and Analysis Tools for Clinical Dose Response Modeling // Bayesian and ML Emax model fitting, graphics and simulation for clinical dose response. The summary data from the dose response meta-analyses in Thomas, Sweeney, and Somayaji (2014) doi:10.1080/19466315.2014.924876 and Thomas and Roy (2016) doi:10.1080/19466315.2016.1256229 Wu, Banerjee, Jin, Menon, Martin, and Heatherington(2017) doi:10.1177/0962280216684528 are included in the package. The prior distributions for the Bayesian analyses default to the posterior predictive distributions derived from these references.
